name: Dark Imgur Direct Image
description: Makes the background color for viewing direct Imgur images (or webm!) a darker color so it is easier on the eyes. Or you can specify your own color for a personalized viewing experience.
additional_info:
NEW!:
  • Hard to see some transparent images? Hover over the image to make the background of it a lighter color to see better!
  • You can now choose your own custom color or simply use the default setting.
